remarks: Comparison of partial sums of two infinite series of reals. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
serge0.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
serge0.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
serle.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` k ) e. RR ) $.
serle.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) <_ ( G ` k ) ) $.
serle $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( + , F ) ` N ) <_ ( seq M ( + , G ) ` N ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
